fusiones.nodo_a_texto: Kay Jamison [ManicState] will conceal medication changes from her treating psychiatrist
fusiones.nodo_b_texto: Kay Jamison [DepressiveState] will defer medication decisions to her psychiatrist rather than trusting her own assessment

fusiones.nodo_a_texto: Kay Jamison [ManicState] will resist psychiatric recommendations to increase medication dosage
fusiones.nodo_b_texto: Kay Jamison [DepressiveState] rejects any psychiatric recommendations for dosage adjustments

fusiones.nodo_a_texto: Kay Jamison [ManicState] will lose direct oversight of patient care details
fusiones.nodo_b_texto: Kay Jamison [DepressiveState] loses autonomous control over her treatment decisions

fusiones.nodo_a_texto: Kay Jamison [ManicState] will feel vindicated in her clinical judgment about her own treatment
fusiones.nodo_b_texto: Kay Jamison [DepressiveState] will experience validation that her concerns are medically legitimate
